website_summaries.verdict: An iffy choice for blow-drying, but customers swear by it for detangling thick, knotty, curly or textured hair.
pros: A great choice for kids with tangled, knotted hair
Works well with curly hair and textured ethnic hair
Glides through any hair type, effortlessly combing out tangles
Can be used on wet or dry hair, as well as extensions and wigs
cons: May not penetrate to the base of thick hair
Melted for a few customers when used with blow dryers

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible knock off. No embossed logo. Cheap tough plastic bristles and tough, hard, non-cushioned rubber for the base of bristles so there is no use purchasing. The whole point of the wet brush is that it is gentler on the hair and scalp for people with sensitive skin or delicate hair. The fact that this is the second time I’ve ordered from two different sellers and still got a knock off that was called genuine really makes me upset. I have complained to Amazon, I hope they listen
customer_reviews.author: Island Crew

customer_reviews.title: Fake- DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are NOT real! I saw others mention it but figured because it was sold through amazon facility that it would be fine. In my mind it was ‘safer’ then going through a third party who is more likely to knock the off items. I was wrong. These are fake and harsh brushes. I used it last night and so much hair was pulled it’s not even funny. To say the least the brush is already in the trash. I thought about using it as a dog brush but my golden retriever is loved dearly and I couldn’t possibly put her through the torture.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Longfellow

customer_reviews.title: Not the same "Wet Brush"
customer_reviews.text: This paddle brush does not brush my wet hair out, like the original oval Wet Brush. I have owned several Wet Brushes, and I'm not certain if this brush is of faulty quality control, or if it is not a genuine Wet Brush. I was excited to purchase, but am extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jmswrigley

customer_reviews.title: This brush is very effective and I agree with other ...
customer_reviews.text: This brush is very effective and I agree with other positive reviews. My hair is naturally curly and soft. I can brush thru my hair smoothly without tangles and pain. When I used the Conair brush, my hair came out, brushing stopped because of tangles, and each time I brushed one of the teeth in the brush came out. I figured it was time to try another brand and hence read numerous reviews. What they say about this brush is true. I will now buy one for my grandchild whose hair is very thick and long.
customer_reviews.author: Osaji

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as previous versions
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this is a case of 'if it ain't broke, continue to change it till the original version is gone and the new version sucks' or what. I recently broke my original paddle Wet Brush, so I bought this one as a replacement. The knobs on the bristles are smaller and 'sharp', making it scratch my head when I use it. My original one had smooth, larger knobs on the ends of the bristles, causing no discomfort. I ordered another, after inspecting the pictures as best I could. Hoping I get one like my old one. Why can't they just leave things along?!?!
customer_reviews.author: hpgreen05

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush in May and loved it. In November, I hit buy again and expected the same brush. I received a brush with holes in the back unlike my first purchase. The bristles were really stiff. Some of the bristles were bent which pulled my hair out. There were barbs at the base of the bristles were they entered the pad. When I pulled my hair out of the brush the barbs literally cut my finger. I would really like to purchase that first brush again, but the only one I can find is this new one with the holes. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jacque berndt

customer_reviews.title: This has been great for my hair right after I shower when I ...
customer_reviews.text: The reason this detangles well is because the bristles have more "give" and are less stiff than other brushes so when they hit tangles rather than get stuck they bend and allow the brush to pass through. This has been great for my hair right after I shower when I put in leave in conditioner. I also use a wide tooth comb for brushing in the shower so I get rid of the more stubborn tangles first. I find if I have really bad tangles it's faster to use my comb.
customer_reviews.author: portia

customer_reviews.title: BEST. BRUSH. EVER. CUSTOMER FOR LIFE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 6 more of these (in different varieties) immediately after my family used this brush. I have waist-length average thickness hair strands with semi-thick wavy hair; my son has long THICK curly hair; my daughter has very very tangled fine straight hair. We were ALL in absolute love with the way this brush glided through each of our very different hair types. My daughter used to cry about brushing her hair and now not anymore. I bought a 3-pack of the mini ones, a 2-pack of the oval ones (one for each kid), and the Epic Pro Shine for myself for dry shampoo days. I can’t say enough great things about this brush. I’ll never use anything else forever.
customer_reviews.author: NoFreeTime

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but WHY NO HOLE FOR HANGING?
customer_reviews.text: this is the best size for me. I have super thick hair so I have been looking for a larger wet brush. I also like that it has drainage holes in the back unlike my original one. only issue is WHY DON'T THESE BRUSHES HAVE HOLES FOR HANGING?? it makes me so angry. Nearly ALL hair brushes have a hole for hanging on the handle EXCEPT the wet brush. I use this in the shower and its frustrating because it is so large and can't be hooked on anything or hung to dry... I might have to drill a hole myself. but whoever designs these without holes is an idiot.
customer_reviews.author: shelby

customer_reviews.title: The best for long hair
customer_reviews.text: The best for long hair!!! I found a review on YouTube about this brush by some makeup addict chic and she had super long hair, I wanted my hair to get longer and she recommended this product. I found it on here cheaper than in store so I got It!! This is my favorite brush!! I literally search my entire house until I find it or I won't brush my hair I refuse lol it saved my hair from so much damage!! My hair is down to my butt and I don't think it would've gotten this long without the wet brush
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in July of 2019. As a side note: I work from home so I usually just throw my hair in a bun or ponytail so I’m admitting I rarely used this brush. This week I had to go to the office for the entire week and instead of spraying my hair with shine I spray it on the brush to diffuse and disperse the shine evenly. This is what destroyed my brush. The brand I used is in the attached photo. As you can see it’s fairly natural product. The brush shouldn’t have dissolved, literally, in my hand. The first stroke and it didn’t even snap, it crumbled. Crazy.
customer_reviews.author: The Sohl

customer_reviews.title: Are people getting free stuff for their 5 star review????
customer_reviews.text: I have the thinnest finest hair... And I have never had more knots in it (and I’ll be 50 in two weeks). Bristles are almost as fine as my hair so it barely brushes through. Not sure how this brush gets 5 stars. It does not get knots out of my hair. I wind up pulling the whole piece of hair out. Past my return window. But for $9 what do you expect?
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Johnsen

customer_reviews.title: Glides right through wet hair
customer_reviews.text: This is the second wet brush that I purchased for my beauty arsenal. I started using the regular Wet brush several years ago and recommended it to everyone I came in contact with. I've always had a phobia of brushing my hair when it's wet, as it's been burned into my brain that it is terrible for your hair, since it's at its most fragile state when wet. Since I started using this brush, I hardly ever have breakage. My hair feels so much softer when I brush with this brush vs a traditional plastic hair brush. I have friends with super curly hair, and even they love the ease of gliding this brush through wet hair!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great for hair but rough on scalp
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of hair but each individual hair is very fine. My hair is also very long and so prone to tangles. This brush is very gentle while still brushing out tangles. Really cuts down on my brushing time. I love this brush the only thing that keeps me from giving it 5 starts is the the bristles are a little stabby and scratch my head. Not sure why they are so rough on my scalp when they are so gentle on my hair. Was hard to get used to. Also I do not have a sensitive head, I have quite the opposite so I can't imagine someone with a sensitive head would enjoy this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Simmer

customer_reviews.title: Good for Fine but Not Thick Hair
customer_reviews.text: For fine hair whether wavy or straight works, this brush is great! My husband loves its massage- like quality with his long fine wavy hair. Size of brush allows for broad strokes and its grip fits smaller to large hands. My hair size isn't fine but rather medium diameter, with thickly distributed waves and curls. The brush barely penetrates to my scalp. It has very gentle and soft bristle. I would not recommend this brush to those whose hair is more like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Vaught-Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Brusha-licious makes ya feel so fergalicious
customer_reviews.text: I decided to write a rhyme to evaluate, if you have time. ***** Lights fade******* (Soft clicking of your finger to set the mood) I woke up this morning with my hair all in knots. I scurried to door after three pounding knocks. Was it the wet brush to fix my caveman locks? Oh indeed it was, inside my Amazon box. Brush, brush, brush all day long. Brush, brush, brush now my tangles are gone. So if you envision you hair as perfect as mine. Might I suggest the wet brush this time. *******soft clicking******** (Exit to left stage with a quick hair toss)
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: FAKE KNOCKOFF
customer_reviews.text: I've used this brush for years and have discovered how to detect a knockoff: firmly grasp one bristle, and try to push it back into the cushion of the brush. If it will go, it’s a fake; return it. If it stays firm, you probably have the real thing. the real wetbrush also has 2 logos. one printed and one embossed. THIS is fake and not worth your time or money. I pushed one of the bristles in immediately and then it came out entirely. RETURNED – never again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: CMR

customer_reviews.title: Great for loose curls
customer_reviews.text: I myself have 3c/4a curls. One of my sons has 3c curls. The tangle teezer works just fine for us, but every time I tried it on my son with 2c curls he’d complain that it hurt. His hair doesn’t get knots like my other son and I, but more of a matted situation and this detangles his hair so gently. I wanted to see if I preferred this over the tangle teezer (since the plastic bristles bend and break over time. It detangles well , seems more durable, and it works miracles on my son’s fine 2c curls.
customer_reviews.author: smeli18

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I never knew there was such a thing as a wet brush until I saw someone recommending one on a morning television show a couple years ago. Why did I wait so long to buy one? I have no idea how it can work so well - but it does! My hair was always difficult to brush out after the shower and now that brush just glides through my hair. It seems impossible but it just works. If you're on the fence about getting one of these my advice is: Don't wait. Stop procrastinating and just do it. You'll be glad you did!
customer_reviews.author: beckyv

customer_reviews.title: Great for getting the tangles out!
customer_reviews.text: I got this brush because I have really dark hair and I’ve recently bleached it so I can have some cool funky colors! This brush is great! It doesn’t damage my hair or make it break! But the reason for 4 stars is that I’ve had 1 spoke fall out in less than a month since using this brush. I use it daily. My hair is wavy, and like 4 inches past my shoulders. So it’s long. I will buy this brush again. I’m disappointed that a spoke fell out. Hopefully no other ones fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Binns - Craven

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: This brush is absolutely life changing. I was skeptical when I bought it, but I was desperate. My hair is long and was getting to the point that it was always tangled and I wasn't able to brush it out because my old hair brush would pull and break off my hair. This brush makes brushing my hair so easy and effortless. I'm also so excited for how it will affect my hair to not being broken off and pulled out daily!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Rodabaugh

customer_reviews.title: this works when no other brushes have worked!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is amazing. I have two daughters with equally thick and matted hair in the morning lol. I bought the brush for my 6 year old who is half hispanic and has thick curly hair which is almost impossible to brush without crying and pain but I used it on my 6 year old and it went right through! My 12 year old has straight hair but it is super thick and ends up matted down every morning. This brush worked perfect for both of my girls with different hair types. It is amazing. I will be buying more of these to make sure that I always have one laying around. this is the best brush ive ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Lotus420

customer_reviews.title: Best brush you could ever hope to have for detangling, especially great for long sensitive hair!
customer_reviews.text: If you have long hair, thick hair, sensitive hair, hair that tangles easily, THIS IS THE BRUSH FOR YOU!!! Seriously, the best brush I've ever owned and I have hair down to my lower back and it's like horse hair and gets tangled 5 seconds after being brushed! I can use this brush and not feel pulling, burning of scalp or pain brushing wet or dry! I would give 10 stars if I could and have multiples so I don't lose them!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4 Boys

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy bristles, not easy to hold. Awful brush!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product, but it was incredibly difficult to like. The brush bristles are much too thin and flimsy. I don't understand how this brush is supposed to detangle when the bristles feel as if they are going to pop at any moment?
customer_reviews.author: S. Guest

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: I wish we had found this sooner! Our daughter's hair is mid-back length and beautiful, straight on the top side but curly underneath. It's a nightmare to brush at any time - until now! This brush does such a nice job on wet hair that even her dry hair is easier to brush now. Her hair now has way less breakage and looks healthier. She's been using this for only a month, so I anticipate even more beautiful hair once the past breakage grows out.
customer_reviews.author: CaliPehrs

customer_reviews.title: Painless Brushing!
customer_reviews.text: I like that I don’t feel any pain when I’m brushing my really long hair, how does it do it? However, the brush gets really dirty with fuzziness I don’t know if that has more to do with my hair or the product itself attracts all the debris in my hair more than other brushes. The comb doesn’t dry the hair at all. But if you have a kid who hates getting their hair brushed because of the pain, buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Cristhian Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for long curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the reviews. I have long, very curly hair which tends to get fairly tangled because of the winds high winds we get in Colorado. I used it for the first time this morning and couldn’t even get it to begin to brush out a tangle. It just brushed over it. I had to go get my old brush out. Definitely would not recommend for people with hair like mine. I gave it two stars because it is easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen McKee

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: I never understood why people loved this brush so much. It just seemed like a normal brush. However after dying my hair lighter, my hair is much more tangled. This brush is magic. I dont know if it is because the bristles are so soft and flexible or because they are plastic, or if it is a special design, or some combo of all of them, but this does not pull, tug, break or rip my hair out. It simply detangles it. Damp or Dry. A few passes and its smooth and tangle free. If you are thinking about it, go ahead and buy it. You will not be sorry. I wish I had purchased this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Leandra Clifton

customer_reviews.title: My favorite detangling brush
customer_reviews.text: I stumbled upon this brush a few years ago, after trying some other brands. It definitely works the best for my post-shower knotty hair. It worked perfectly up until recently, when the bristles started getting pushed in and bending in every direction.... after a solid 3 years of daily use. I’m pretty satisfied with spending another $9 if I get even 1/4 of the same use out of it! Cheaper on here than any big box store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the original!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush! I've had the original wet brush for years and when it was time to replace I heard rave reviews about the paddle style. So glad I tried it! It goes through my thick hair much better than the original while still being gentle. My only little issue is that the plastic nubs at the ends of the bristles make it impossible to clean off the fuzzies that collect but that's a problem with all brushes of this style. Definitely recommend, life changer.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. I would give this no stars if I could. I have a REAL wet brush and this is obviously a cheap knock off. Hard bristles, cheaply made, the “logo” is already coming off and I just “unpackaged” my item. By “unpackaged” I mean it wasn’t even packaged correctly and was falling out of the box. Very unhappy. I even decided to give the bush a chance despite what you have already heard and I tried it. It ripped through my hair and pulled a lot of my hair out. I have never written a bad review before and I hope I don’t have to again. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Miles

customer_reviews.title: Best Brush Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely long, coarse hair, and I have always had issues getting tangles out of my hair. I run quite a bit, and even with putting my hair in a braid, I always get my hair tangled after workouts. This brush runs through my hair like butter, and it is the BEST BRUSH I have ever owned! I use a round brush to style my hair and have found that because the bristles in the Wet Brush are flimsy, I have found it is not ideal to style your hair with the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Bell

customer_reviews.title: This brush save my hair
customer_reviews.text: I was loosing my hair because it was very tangled after I did the highlight and the keratin, The hairstylist recommend me this one and its been about 2 years and this is the only brush I use after I shower.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica D.

customer_reviews.title: Give it a go!
customer_reviews.text: I got the knockoff version of this brush and I regretted it. It felt like I was getting stabbed in head by tiny needles. I dished out the money for this brush and it's totally worth it! It doesn't hurt and it gets the job done. I never liked to brush my hair while it was wet because you could hear the hair ripping but not with this brush. It glides. I put on some detangler/ heady protectant to add some smoothness and it works like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my Yorkies. They like it much better than a regular dog brush. It goes through their medium long hair easily and removes those little tangles they're prone to getting. They actually line up or push each other out of the way to get their turn, something they never did with any of the other brushes I have for them. Even the cat liked it!
customer_reviews.author: R. Latimer

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Really Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I’m from the Caribbean and I have 4c hair. Like, so kinky you can’t really see a visible curl pattern. I always have a hard time strangling. Bought a de man brush and it worked okay but detangling was still painful and took some time. Imagine my damn shock when I used this brush and it just, almost effortlessly detangles my hair. I literally eyed the brush trying to figure out what the hell the bristles were made of and what’s so special about it compared to other brushes. It looks like other paddle brushes to me. But it really works in my hair and I detangled without losing an entire ball of hair. Love this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I expected the bristles to be a lot more durable. These are flimsy and only do the job if my hair is pretty much been detangled within the last 2-3 days. If I let my hair stay without wash a few more days then the next time I detangle it’s a lot harder to detangle because this paddle shaped brush is not strong enough for my kind of 3b-3c curls. I’m going to see if I can purchase the original oval shaped Wet brush from Sally’s or somewhere more credible. I’m afraid I could have received a dupe.
customer_reviews.author: KissAndMakeup

customer_reviews.title: Only brush I'll ever use!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about this brush. Ever since I was little, my hair has been a nightmare to manage. No matter what I do, I always end up with tons of knots/tangles at the end of the day. I have a lot of hair, and I used to dread having to brush it when I got out of the shower. The original Wet Brush worked ok for me, but the paddle version is a godsend! It works great for my thick, wavy hair—wet or dry!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Not so great...at all
customer_reviews.text: I am not one to write reviews, but I feel I should share a few things. First off, the bristles on this brush are SO flimsy. I can't brush through my hair while it's wet without the bristled going flat. Also, the box states how fabulous the handle is. I must say this is the most UNCOMFORTABLE brush handle ever. It's very flat and hard to hold on to. Not to mention how tired my hand got whole drying my hair (which this brush claims to assist with)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my long hair.
customer_reviews.text: I have long hair with wiry grey throughout. I thought I'd give this a try since brushing or combing after shower pulls out tons of hair. I am always careful not to "pull" and start brushing from bottom, etc. Whalah...I saw tons LESS hair in the brush than when I use other brushes and combs. I use it on my dry hair too now. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Princesilla

customer_reviews.title: Great detangling brush.
customer_reviews.text: We first got this brush from my hair dresser. She recommended it for my daughter's long and tangle-prone hair. I can't believe how much easier it is to comb her hair now! After my daughter gets out of the shower, we spray her hair with Bumble and Bumble's Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Primer (which works and smells amazing btw) and then we brush her hair out. What used to take us over 20 minutes, now takes us 5. It's incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Soft bristles help to de tangle. I got a little girl with curly thick hair and she finds this so much softer for me to detangle and not pull so much. I also have a girl with thick straight hair and she says the same thing. It’s their new favorite brush. The thing with this brush is that detangling is easier but it might take you 3-5 min longer sometimes of course depending on how tangled the hair is overall but i highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: PatrishaVenegas

customer_reviews.title: Not great for thick/curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely long, thick, curly hair, and the only time I can effectively brush it is in the shower. Unfortunately, the bristles on this hairbrush are not stiff/thick enough for me, and will fold/collapse/squish (however you'd like to phrase it) against the first layer of my hair instead of actually brushing all the way through. I like the fact that it doesn't trap water inside the top so I can easily have it in the shower with me, but it doesn't really do its job. My hair is just too thick and curly.
customer_reviews.author: Em Bennett

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this. Only regret is not trying it sooner. Super light weight, doesn’t pull at all, dries immediately. I got one for my daughter as well who has curly hair (mine is pin straight) & it works amazing on her as well! Which is awesome because regular brushes pull and get caught up in her curls. Absolutely buy one. Heck, buy 2!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Try this before you try an
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have high hopes, but this was recommended by a blogger and no pricey so I thought I’d give it a try. I have long hair and had been getting concerned about how much hair i was losing during brushing and styling. It was pretty scary. The difference since getting the brush was really surprising. I also have an issue thinking something needs to cost more to be more effective and this is not the case here. I’m barely losing any hair in my brush and the brush glides right through wet hair. Not sure how they do this but I’m really happy I found it. I even emailed the blogger and thanked her for the recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Massey

customer_reviews.title: Hair Saver!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush after hearing multiple times how much better it is for your hair. I will say... I seem to have less damage since using it and don't feel like my hair gets as tangled when brushing. It is super light weight and doesn't have that hard bristle feel that makes it hard to brush your hair for too long. :)
customer_reviews.author: StormCrow

customer_reviews.title: BEST BRUSH ever for detangling thick hair
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has the thickest mane of hair you've ever seen - honestly, people point it out all the time. It's a blessing, but also a lot to manage! We've struggled with detangling it, until we found this AMAZING brush. We only used it with conditioner in the shower first, but now switched to using it in the morning, too. It's a true game-changer, honestly works like magic, with 90% less "ouch, ouch".
customer_reviews.author: Orange Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Best brush ever regardless of price
customer_reviews.text: My 6 y/o daughter would start to cry every time I brushed her hair (and I was using a $100 Mason Pearson brush). I originally bought this brush for me to replace one that I had lost. But, when I got this my daughter wanted to try it and it has changed our hair brushing life. No more tears. Additionally, she brushes her hair on her own without my help at all. She is able to independently get out all the knots when her hair is wet or dry. Best brush ever regardless of price. The price is just bonus.
customer_reviews.author: J. Balfour

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: I have the thickest head of hair , this brush cuts right through it and detangles like no brush I have ever had, and with ZERO pain or pulling. Old brushes would literally break off in my hair, and would rip my hair out. this has stood up to my mane without breaking a single bristle. 100% recommend to anyone with a wild head of hair Who doesn’t want to be in agony brushing out knots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long hair loves the paddle wet brush
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd wet brush and 2nd paddle brush. It really doesn’t get better than these. I have long hair and hate brushing it when it’s wet and will only do it with a wet brush! My old one broke after 3 years and I immediately ordered a new one!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Pack

customer_reviews.title: Best brush on the MARKET for unruly hair!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST BRUSH IN THE WORLD!! My brush dropped into the toilet last week and i have been using a pick on my curly tangled hair. My hair has been a wreck and the first day i received my product i used on my wet and tangled hair. Now let me tell you this thing went thru like BUTTER and didn't rip my hair!!! My little sister with thick curly hair past her butt recommended this brush to me and ill never go back!! 11/10
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this brush!!
customer_reviews.text: Why am I now just using this brush?? The first two pictures are the ones I have used in the past because they were recommended for my fine, curly hair and extensions when I have them and I thought the hair collected was normal. After using this new brush I now realize I have less hair fall/breakage and it is so smooth when combing through my hair whether it is dry or wet. I don’t have any hair tugging. I highly recommend this brush! I will definitely be getting it for friends and will buy again when needed. So so so so great!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush is very good at detaining hair. It's also gentle on the hair and doesn't break the hair off as bad as Conair brushes! The bristles seem to move with the hair if you know what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Seifert

customer_reviews.title: Solid Brush
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has thick hair and has hair brushes routinely break apart in my hair I was unsure about this one. After recommendations by a friend I purchased this and have been very happy with it. It doesn't pull my hair like other brushes do and I feel like it works better than a wide tooth comb post hair washing. It's light weight and easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Bigdog

customer_reviews.title: I have thick, curly long hair
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one (just like this) that I've purchased. I can only brush my hair in the shower after I have put conditioner and detangler on it. I hold on to my hair while I brush it through. It takes a little time with the kind of hair I have. Highly recommend the paddle brush.
customer_reviews.author: Love Cats

customer_reviews.title: Great for tender scalp
customer_reviews.text: This brush has greatly reduced my anxiety about shampooing and detangling my natural hair. I have an extremely tender scalp and this brush makes detangling a smooth breeze. The only thing I would change is the slick finish. It's hard to hold onto when product is on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Extremely long hair Review.
customer_reviews.text: My hair is past my butt in length. It is thick and im super lazy when it comes to braiding my hair before i fall asleep. I usually end up sleeping in a bun, only to wake up with multiple knots. This brush has solved the painful morning routine for me, it combs through it gently and my hair ends up untangled and soft. This brush is a game changer and a necessity.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I wish they would pay me to promote these brushes...
customer_reviews.text: I Cannot say enough great things about this line. I use the wet brush on wet, dry, damp, tangled, untangled, messy, straight, and when my hair is curly. In my 27 years i've never had a brush that didn't hurt my head AND get the tangles out at the same time. I seriously own 3 of these and give them as gifts all the time. I've had other paddle brushes that look the same but the fine prongs of this brush easily go through my hair which is thin but there is a lot of it. For the price, just get it an try it! I wish I could personally guarantee it!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Brunetto

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the original Wet Brush for about 5 or 6 years now and as great as those are, this is even more of an improvement. The bristles are so soft and gentle and do not tug at hair at all. I am so impressed. My little girl hasn't cried about me accidentally pulling her hair once since I've gotten this. This is definitely my new favorite brush.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Like buttah
customer_reviews.text: This brush is my new obsession. My hair is a tangled mess when I wash it. I have normal to thick, wavey, porous hair. So my strands soak up water like a sponge and feta going is a B. This brush is like buttah. I swear tah gad. I want to buy a few for the little ones so they never have to cry.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Feliciani

customer_reviews.title: Best of Its Kind
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brush! I misplaced my old brush, so I've decided to try something new. I have natural (3B/3C) hair, and I was looking for a good brush to distribute conditioner for my wash and go styles. This brush impressed me. I normally have to go over each strand with my fingers, to make sure the conditioner has gotten everywhere. This brush made it simple, and conditioner was spread from my scalp to ends very quickly. The brush isn't flimsy at all. Also, I really like the ventilation holes on the back; they seem to make a difference, compared to similar brushes.
customer_reviews.author: princesspetite

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally curly hair that's always gets tangly overnight no matter what I do - I've tried satin pillowcases, silk bonnets, pineappling, you name it. So, I have to detangle my hair in the shower in the morning when there's conditioner in it. Previously, I was using my fingers to detangle it as gently as I could, but there was definitely some snagging and pain involved. Today, I used the Wet Brush for the first time and it was effective, gentle, and completely painless. I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best style wet brush
customer_reviews.text: These are the best style wet brushes we have used. Myself and all 4 of my girls have thick, curly hair, and this particular brush is the only one that is gentle enough but actually brushes theough all of the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifechanging
customer_reviews.text: It regularly takes me 10 minutes to brush my long, long hair. I honestly am in complete shock that this brush works as amazingly as it does - it took me maybe 20 seconds to brush my hair! There's some sort of witchcraft sorcery business going on with this brush, but man, it's going to save me so much time. I've been proselytizing about it to everyone who'll listen, truly a gamechanger.
customer_reviews.author: Ash B

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Daughter Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I read people saying it’s a fake/“knock off” but even if it is, the brush I received is AMAZING! My soon-to-be 4 year old used to hate getting her hair brushed because of it hurting but with this brush, she now knows it doesn’t hurt anymore. She has thick and long hair and whether I brush it wet or completely dry, it brushes out smoothly! I brushed it dry without even having to hold her hair last night. She loved it! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Tom C

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be renamed as "The Magic Brush"
customer_reviews.text: I normally am not one to write reviews but as I was brushing my hair I felt the need to! Let me first just start by saying WOW!!!! When I was brushing with it I was thinking at first "am I brushing my hair?"like seriously you cannot feel that you are brushing your hair! It detangles perfectly and you dont even feel it! No pain. Nothing. I dont know what kind of witchcraft or sorcery is within the brush but whatever it is I highly recommend this for anyone who dreads brushing the big knots in your head. Or if you have children that are sensitive to brushes. You cant go wrong! You'll be happy you made the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Karmagirl89

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: The most brilliant brush in the world! I don't think they're could ever be a single soul who wouldn't just adore this brush! The brush is so gentle on your hair yet it works insanely well at detangling. My daughter who hates getting her long hair brushed after a shower now asks me to use this brush any chance she gets, she'll make excuses to use it. It's THAT comfortable and feels like you're pampering your hair more than actually brushing because it doesn't pull or snag or feel any bit painful BUT YET it is the best brush I've ever used to brush my hair, use in my wet hair, use to blow dry my hair straight, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M.

customer_reviews.title: You NEED this brush!
customer_reviews.text: One word. WOW. I have been using the wrong brush to comb my hair my entire life. I have long hair, and this brush is so gentle and combs straight through wet or dry hair without pulling at all. I have saved so much hair in the past two weeks by switching to this brush. Thank you !!!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for long hair
customer_reviews.text: I have super long and thick hair (literally, my friends call my Rapunzel) and this is the only brush that helps me actually brush my hair. I use it both with wet and dry hair and it always gets the job done. I'm really happy the brand made a big paddle brush because the smaller size, while great, was just too small for me
customer_reviews.author: noelle_cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Best Brush for Super Tangley Hair
customer_reviews.text: This brush actually works for me and my daughter. I've used a hair pick to comb my hair for the last 20 years because of how tangley my hair is. A friend at work recommended this brush and I reluctantly tried it. It works great on both wet and dry hair. I love to use it to brush my daughter's hair because it doesn't pull any snags or hurt her. Wish I had this brush years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buying More
customer_reviews.text: This is about the 5th brush I've got to detangle my girls hair. Not sure what it is about the square head that makes is so awesome, but I will def. buy more. It feels just like the oval wet brushes, but for some reason those don't work nearly as good at this one. VERY happy!
customer_reviews.author: foosdiva

customer_reviews.title: Best brush I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best brush I've ever used. Doesn't pull my hair when brushing it dry or just out of the shower. My hairloss while brushing has dropped dramatically. And they are Incredibly durable. This is the 2nd one I've purchased. I've had my first brush for over 4 yrs and all bristles are still intact and works like it's brand new. Only bought the second one to put in my gym bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great detangler!
customer_reviews.text: I use this brush right out of the shower (and sometimes to distribute my conditioner in the shower) to de-tangle and prep my hair for root spray and a blow out. It works quickly and painlessly without pulling or breaking my very fine and delicate hair. I’m super pleased with this brush and would absolutely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: MsDelilah

customer_reviews.title: After I got one for myself I got one for my sister
customer_reviews.text: I have curly, fine, hair, while my sisters hair is extremely long and ridiculously thick, straight-wavy hair. She gets tired brushing her hair, and broke her collar bone, so between her good arm, and us helping her brush it, it was a full time job. This detangled her hair in less than 5 mins, when it would easily take 20 before. And she can do it herself.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Best hairbrush i've had in my ENTIRE life
customer_reviews.text: Best hairbrush i've had in my ENTIRE life. It detangles hair like it's no big deal. Wet or dry. I used to dread brushing my hair as i knew it would hurt like hell and after i purchased this brush my life literally changed. It doesn't hurt when i brush anymore (not even when i have knots) and i have noticed less breakage in my hair. I would buy this again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Leane

customer_reviews.title: Best. Brush. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review before but I could not idly stand by when these other people are slandering this brush. I have very long, natural hair. It is thick and gets knotty instantly. It’s annoying and would typically take me a hour or so to detangle before AND after a shower. NOT. ANY. MORE. this brush instantly removes tangles, it’s unreal. I use it on my wet or dry hair. It’s amazing. The only reason I didn’t give 5/5 on drying is because I never use a hair dryer. But I will say, it does make my hair dry faster even without one.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: First brush in a long time
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brush to use to massage my scalp in between washes. It is the first brush I've owned since I was a young girl. I use it after using dry shampoo to help loosen and remove dirt/oil. Works great and doesn't tangle. PS-I use it dry instead of wet.
customer_reviews.author: M Castleton

customer_reviews.title: Great Gentle Hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: Bristles are soft and gentle on the scalp. Since the bristles are flexible, this is a good hairbrush for brushing out your hair when it is wet without having to worry about breakage. I also like that this product comes in a variety of colors including all black which is what I prefer in all of my hair styling tools.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith & Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Fast Brushing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush to help with detangling in less time and it works for that. Just make sure that when you are using it you do the underside of your hair multiple times because it only brushes shallowly so for those with thicker hair like me it misses some of the knots.
customer_reviews.author: Qu Schmick

customer_reviews.title: Great product!! 5 Stars! Not a paid review.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing brush! We had never owned a wet brush before so I bought blindly and I’m so glad I did. I’m not sure if it’s the original or not but we love it!! It’s heavy it’s well made it’s durable. My kids have long thick hair and this brush leaves it shiny, soft and silky. No more tears when I brush their hair. I recommend it. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ThreeGs

customer_reviews.title: No Pain and Makes Hair Dry Faster
customer_reviews.text: I tried my sister's Wet Brush and knew I had to get one for myself. After a shower, I put a little hair product in and run the brush through my hair. It does not hurt at all and I love that the paddle has holes on the other side to let air in. I have straight hair with a bit of wave, and when I use this brush I can skip the blow dryer and my hair drys very straight. Or if I do use the dryer, it's much faster. Would also be great for a kid (though maybe not the larger paddle) as brushing is painless.
customer_reviews.author: elise

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick, wavy, long hair. For a while, I was buying children's detangler because my hair is so knotty. I would literally dread getting out of the shower and having to brush my hair. One of my friends recommended that I try a wet brush and I am so glad I found this product. I still have to use detangler from time to time, but this brush has made brushing my hair ten times easier. I would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Wet Brush
customer_reviews.text: I feel that the wet brush is a very good brush. Used it both wet and dry. The tangles I get in my hair are horrendous. I have tried a lot of brushes and this gets my tangles out virtually pain free. Used it in the shower and got through my hair and the best part hardly any hair in the brush from pulling it out. I tried it when I woke up and it went through my hair once again with only strands in the brush from pulling out. Its lightweight and very easy to handle, not clumsy like others. Would definitely recommend this brush for people with long hair that easily tangles. Very happy with it indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Steve and Emma

customer_reviews.title: This brush is awesome - it brushes out the knots in her long ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has long hair and is very sensitive about me brushing her hair because it hurts with all the tangles. It was always a screaming fight when I tried to brush her hair. This brush is awesome - it brushes out the knots in her long wet hair - no screaming - especially when underbrushing at the nape of the neck. I loved this so much that I kept it for myself and bought her another brush.
customer_reviews.author: AKT

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: Mixed feelings because it’s soft on the head but almost too soft for thick hair to get through all the tangles deeper at the bottom layer. Made for thin hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The brush is super pretty -- love the metallic purple -- but I've ...
customer_reviews.text: The brush is super pretty -- love the metallic purple -- but I've had other brushes at the same price point last a lot longer. I have mid length straight hair, and not too tangly. The bristles on this brush are really weak. Several were loose after a few months, and now after a year most of the bristles are totally collapsed and useless. If you need a brush for the short term, like you're on vacation and forgot yours or something, this one is fine. But it's not the choice for longterm use.
customer_reviews.author: vultch

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. I have thick long curly to wavy hair when I say think I mean 3-4 times the amount of hair of most women. I hate brushing my hair and with this brush I’m amazed and confused at how it’s so easy and why I didn’t discover this product sooner! Buy it. Also I brush my hair when it’s wet. And I use an awesome detangler by Eva-nyc called mane magic 10 in 1 but still it was very easy to brush my long hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only brush I've used for the past year.
customer_reviews.text: I have long hair and it is the only brush I will use. It gets the knots out and doesn't damage my hair so it has been the only one I've been using for the past year. Originally I had 2 (1 for on the go and 1 for at home) and lost one. When I lost one, I started to use a standard paddle brush for about a week before I started noticing it damaging my hair and immediately ordered another. Honestly, I will continue to use this. This is definitely a "holy grail" product. Fast shipping too. Would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wow....!
customer_reviews.text: I've never brushed my hair when wet, always combed it with a wide tooth comb. BUT.. let me tell you! I'm SUPER IMPRESSED with this brush. I highly recommend it... I hardly leave reviews on here.. but had to do it this time!
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Best brush I’ve ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the best brush I’ve ever bought, and that’s saying a lot! It’s the only one I’ve felt comfortable brushing my wet hair with. I have pretty long, straight, medium thickness hair that sheds like crazy! This brush has cut down drastically on my shedding after I get out of the shower and on the frizziness once it dries!
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: Heaven Sent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my GOD. Why did I never know this brush existed!? I’m currently in hair school doing a bunch of chemical services on doll heads so eventually they start getting tangled and breaking off and this is PERFECT to detangle and also use during chemical services and there’s the most minimal damage. Before I use to take at least a handful of hair out just with brushing. I’ll be buying this for the rest of my life when my first one finally breaks.
customer_reviews.author: G A L A X Y B 😒 Y.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a durable brush.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t get the hype. It works like a regular brush to me, but it’s lighter than the common brushes. These days we prefer wooden handles brushes, which are even lighter. In the end, it’s a durable brush, that works well.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Boiko

customer_reviews.title: Is this product even REAL?!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING?!?!?!?! I would give 1000000 stars if I could. I have heavily dyed, extremely thick and tangled hair. It's a mess. I don't think I've ever had my hair this untangled since 2014. The second I put this brush through my hair it slid through painlessly like my hair wasn't a complete knotted mess. Definitely going to recommend this product to all my family and friends in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing brush!
customer_reviews.text: I put off buying this because I didn't think it would be any different from any brush I have used in the past. Boy was I wrong. This brush is amazing. It saves me so much time now because by hair is very difficult to get a brush or comb through due to all the tangles and this brush goes through it with no problems. I don't understand how it does that but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: NATURAL HAIR OVER HERE😉
customer_reviews.text: Not Being Nasty Or Rude At All. Even Though Not Paid To Do So, I Wanted To Give A Honest Review. SO, I Used The Brush First. Then Put It Back In The Package Because I Didn't Take A Picture When I First Received It From The Delivery Driver. Now I'm Doing A Review. I Found Out About Wet Brush Products When I Bought A Comb For Natural Hair By The Name Of Texture Pro. All By J And D Beauty. Anyway, I Tried This Brush On My Natural Hair While Wet And Dry. It Has Lived Up To What It Says. Excellent Brush. No Regrets At All. Detangles Fast.
customer_reviews.author: C.Weeks-Todd

customer_reviews.title: The Best Brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush is amazing. I have long hair on the thinner side of average so it tangles at the crown and at the nape of my neck all day, every day. I remember tearing out huge chunks of hair before this brush. Now it's so much easier -straight out of the shower with a little leave-in conditioner and I can brush through my hair completely. I let my hair air-dry so I prefer to be able to brush through shortly after showering to keep my hair as straight and sleek as possible. This works for that. I will love it forever.
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: great brush for long curly hair
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had long curly hair that gets very tangled. Every. Single. Day. Love the larger surface area of this brush. Cuts brushing time down. We use this brush trice a day and it is holding up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Best Brush Ever
customer_reviews.text: My sister recommended this brush to me and I love it. I'm seeing it in every salon I go to now. It's incredibly soft on my hair and does not pull my hair out. The bristles are so soft that it is actually relaxing to brush my hair. I have thin/fine hair so my hair gets very knotty after a shower but this brush just glides right through. I do not use it in the shower but my sister does and she says it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Beard

customer_reviews.title: Easily handles long, thick hair!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product! I have long, thick hair but my strands are thin which leads to constant tangling. This brush easily gets knots and tangles out of my hair in under 5 minutes. It's been a real miracle. I would (and have) recommend this product to anyone! Real value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: courrege

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: My daughter’s hair is fine but gets tangled so easily; especially after we wash her hair in the shower. Getting ready for school in the morning was a hassle and everyday tears shed because it hurts trying to get the tangles out (even when she is brushing her hair herself). This brush is amazing! Got the tangles right out, no hassle, no struggling, no tears.
customer_reviews.author: lvantay

product_meta.title: The Wet Brush 1 Count Pro Select Condition Edition Paddle Brush Stone Cold Steel
product_meta.description: Color:SilverBrush your wet hair anywhere easily with the Pro Select Condition Edition Paddle Brush Stone Cold Steel from Wet Brush. The Wet Brush set out on a mission to conquer the horrible issue of detangling hair without the tears or damage. They created a unique brush with IntelliFlex bristles that effortlessly run through hair and detangles wet or dry hair without pulling or tugging.
feature_bullets: The wet brush can be used on wet or dry hair and works on extensions and wigs
It is recommended for all hair types
The wet brush will detangle your knots with ease no matter what hair type
